email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 8500MT - MV OCEANHAWK
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to charter a vessel for shipping 8500MT of steel coils from Houston to Rotterdam under FOB terms. The MV OCEANHAWK seems suitable for this cargo. Could you confirm her availability and provide a freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 8500MT - MV OCEANHAWK
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. The MV OCEANHAWK is currently available and can be positioned to Houston for your shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per metric tonne. The laycan is from October 10 to October 15. Let me know if you need further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 8500MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 45.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review this and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window in Houston?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 8500MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 43.00 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window in Houston is 72 hours. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 8500MT - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The revised rate of USD 43.00 is acceptable. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEANHAWK
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Great to hear that! I have attached the charter party for your review. The laycan is confirmed as October 10 to October 15. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEANHAWK
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance!

Best regards,
Lucas
